```{r, echo=FALSE, meassage=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
```

## REAL ESTATE MARKET BEHAVIOR MODELING

### 1. OFFER TYPE

### Use case: `Low Density Building types`

**STEP 1: Load the data**

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
source("R/datasources.R")
ppp_data <- ppp_data_local

source("R/utils.R")
# Predominant offer type
# alt 1. Using rename_cat_agg
ppp_recat <- ppp_data %>%
rename_cat_agg(cat_col = property_type,
new_col_str = "agg_col",
cat_a = "residential-types",
cat_b = "non-residential-types")
prop.table(table(ppp_recat$agg_col))

# alt 2. Mapping user defined function (non performant)
density_types <- map_chr(ppp_data$property_type,
index_cat_agg,
cat_a_idx = 3,
cat_b_idx = 4)
ppp_data$density_types <- density_types
prop.table(table(ppp_data$density_types))

# Load the data (use ppp_recat or ppp_data)
ppp_sel <- select_building_types(
  input_data = ppp_data,
  currency = "USD",
  btypes = c("PH", "Casa"),
  operation = c("Venta"))

ppp_geo <- ppp_sel %>%
st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326)
```

**STEP 2: Define the analysis zone**

2.1. Using Polygons shape file (e.g. target neighborhoods)

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, out.width=900, out.height=350}

# Area of interest
aoi <- neighborhoods %>%
filter(COMUNA %in% c(4, 8))
aoi_wgs <- st_transform(aoi, 4326)

# Low density building types in southern neighborhoods
offer_area <- st_intersection(ppp_geo, aoi_wgs)
tmap_mode("view") +
tm_shape(offer_area) +
tm_dots(col = "tipo",
palette = "RdYlBu",
stretch.palette = TRUE,
size = 0.05,
style = "cont")

```

2.3. Using single polygon geom limits (e.g. drawn area)

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning= FALSE, out.width=900, out.height=350}
# Area of interest
aoi <- st_read(json_char)
aoi_wgs <- st_transform(aoi, 4326)

# Low density building types in southern neighborhoods
offer_area <- st_intersection(ppp_geo, aoi_wgs)
tmap_mode("view") +
tm_shape(offer_area) +
tm_dots(col = "tipo", palette = "RdYlBu",
stretch.palette = TRUE,
size = 0.05, shape = 21,
style = "cont")
```

**STEP 3: Find low density building types**

```{r}
source("models.R")
real_estate_offer(offer_area = offer_area, prediction_method = "orthogonal")
```
